practice of the renunciate.

original: gnyis ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyis 'bras bu'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba thob pa'i skal pa dang ldan pa la dbang byed pa'i don gyis so //
analyzed: gnyis ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyis 'bras bu'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba thob pa'i skal pa dang ldan pa la dbang byed pa'i don gyis so //
translated: The first two are the faculties of faith, etc., because they have the meaning of ruling over the attainment of the result of going forth as a spiritual practitioner.

original: gcig ni dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba la dbang byed pa'i don gyis so //
analyzed: gcig ni dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba la dbang byed pa'i don gyis so //
translated: The third is the faculty of mindfulness, because it has the meaning of ruling over the increase of virtue.

original: lnga ni shes bzhin du spyod pa la dbang byed pa'i don gyis so //
analyzed: lnga ni shes bzhin du spyod pa la dbang byed pa'i don gyis so //
translated: The next five are the faculties of full knowing, because they have the meaning of ruling over the practice of full knowing.

original: lnga ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i lam la dbang byed pa'i don gyis so //
analyzed: lnga ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i lam la dbang byed pa'i don gyis so //
translated: The next five are the faculties of full knowing, because they have the meaning of ruling over the path of preparation for the result of a spiritual practitioner.

original: gsum ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyis 'bras bu 'thob pa la dbang byed pa'i don gyis rnam par gzhag par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gsum ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyis 'bras bu 'thob pa la dbang byed pa'i don gyis rnam par gzhag par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The last three are the faculties of full knowing, because they have the meaning of ruling over the attainment of the result of a spiritual practitioner.

original: bar sdom ni /
analyzed: bar sdom ni /
translated: The summary:üîΩFollowing objects, etc.,üîΩclear, looking inward,üîΩbeautiful, two kinds of sentient beings,

original: yul la rjes su 'jug sogs dang // gsal dang nang du bltas pa dang // mdzes dang sems can rnam gnyis dang // btags dang bsdams la sogs pa yin //
analyzed: yul la rjes su 'jug sogs dang // gsal dang nang du bltas pa dang // mdzes dang sems can rnam gnyis dang // btags dang bsdams la sogs pa yin //
translated: imputed, restrained, and so on.

original: mig gi dbang pos ci byed ce na /
analyzed: mig gi dbang pos ci byed ce na /
translated: What does the eye faculty do?

original: smras pa / gzugs rnams la bltas pa dang lta bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: smras pa / gzugs rnams la bltas pa dang lta bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: He says: It is the seeing of forms and the seeing that will be.

original: de bzhin du rna ba'i dbang po la sogs pa yid kyi dbang po'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi las kyang ci rigs par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba'i dbang po la sogs pa yid kyi dbang po'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi las kyang ci rigs par blta bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the functions of the ear faculty, etc., up to the mind faculty should be seen in their respective ways.

original: pho'i dbang po dang mo'i dbang po gnyis kyis ci byed ce na /
analyzed: pho'i dbang po dang mo'i dbang po gnyis kyis ci byed ce na /
translated: What is the function of the male and female faculties?

original: smras pa / chung ma dang bu dang bu mo dang pha ma dang de dang 'brel pa'i gnyen 'dab yongs su 'dzin pa kun tu snang bar byed do //
analyzed: smras pa / chung ma dang bu dang bu mo dang pha ma dang de dang 'brel pa'i gnyen 'dab yongs su 'dzin pa kun tu snang bar byed do //
translated: He says: They cause the appearance of the full complement of wife, son, daughter, father, mother, and relatives.

original: srog gi dbang pos ci byed ce na /üîΩsmras pa / gson pa dang 'tsho ba dang @91a * //
analyzed: srog gi dbang pos ci byed ce na / smras pa / gson pa dang 'tsho ba dang @91a * //
translated: What is the function of the life faculty?

original: 'dug pa dang sdod pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dug pa dang sdod pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar byed do //
translated: He says: It causes the enumeration of being alive, living, existing, and enduring.

original: tshor bar bsdus pa'i dbang po rnams kyis ci byed ce na /
analyzed: tshor bar bsdus pa'i dbang po rnams kyis ci byed ce na /
translated: What is the function of the faculties that are included in feeling?

original: smras pa / 'byor pa dang rgud pa nyams su myong bar byed do //
analyzed: smras pa / 'byor pa dang rgud pa nyams su myong bar byed do //
translated: He says: They cause the experience of prosperity and decline.

original: dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams kyis ci byed ce na /
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams kyis ci byed ce na /
translated: What is the function of the faculties of faith, etc.?

original: smras pa / bde 'gror skye ba dang ; mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: smras pa / bde 'gror skye ba dang ; mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He says: It causes the completion of the accumulations for rebirth in happy realms and for nirvana.

original: dbang po tha ma gsum gyis ci byed ce na /
analyzed: dbang po tha ma gsum gyis ci byed ce na /
translated: What do the three highest faculties do?

original: smras pa / tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par byed do //
analyzed: smras pa / tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par byed do //
translated: He says: They cause the attainment of nirvana in this life.

original: dbang po de dag las du ni rdzas su yod pa yin /
analyzed: dbang po de dag las du ni rdzas su yod pa yin /
translated: Among these faculties, how many are substantial entities?

original: du ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: du ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: How many are not?

original: smras pa / drug ni rdzas su yod pa yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / drug ni rdzas su yod pa yin no //
translated: He says: Six are substantial entities.

original: lhag ma rnams ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni ma yin no //
translated: The rest are not.

original: du zhig gzugs kyis bsdus pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig gzugs kyis bsdus pa yin zhe na /
translated: How many are included in form?

original: smras pa / bdun no //
analyzed: smras pa / bdun no //
translated: He says: Seven.

original: du zhig sems kyis bsdus pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig sems kyis bsdus pa yin zhe na /
translated: How many are included in mind?

original: smras pa / gcig dang gsum gyi phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / gcig dang gsum gyi phyogs so //
translated: He says: One and three parts.

original: du zhig sems las byung bas bsdus pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig sems las byung bas bsdus pa yin zhe na /
translated: How many are included in mental factors?

original: smras pa / bcu dang gsum gyi phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / bcu dang gsum gyi phyogs so //
translated: He says: Ten and three parts.

original: du zhig sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa yin zhe na /
translated: How many are not associated with mind?

original: smras pa / gcig go //
analyzed: smras pa / gcig go //
translated: He says: One.

original: du zhig 'dus byas yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig 'dus byas yin zhe na /
translated: How many are conditioned?

original: smras pa / thams cad 'dus byas yin te /
analyzed: smras pa / thams cad 'dus byas yin te /
translated: He says: All are conditioned.

original: dbang po la 'dus byas ma yin pa ni med do //
analyzed: dbang po la 'dus byas ma yin pa ni med do //
translated: There is no faculty that is not conditioned.

original: pho'i dbang po dang mo'i dbang po /
analyzed: pho'i dbang po dang mo'i dbang po /
translated: The male faculty and the female faculty

original: dbang po gang gi cha yin zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po gang gi cha yin zhe na /
translated: are parts of what faculty?

original: smras pa / lus kyi dbang po'i'o //
analyzed: smras pa / lus kyi dbang po'i'o //
translated: He says: The body faculty.

original: dbang po tha ma gsum gang gi cha yin zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po tha ma gsum gang gi cha yin zhe na /
translated: Are the last three faculties parts of what?

original: smras pa / dgu'i ste yid kyi dbang po dang / dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: smras pa / dgu'i ste yid kyi dbang po dang / dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams kyi'o //
translated: He says: Nine: the mental faculty, the five beginning with faith, and the faculties of pleasure, mental pleasure, and indifference.

original: srog gi dbang po gang gi cha yin zhe na /
analyzed: srog gi dbang po gang gi cha yin zhe na /
translated: Of what is the life faculty a part?

original: smras pa / gang gi yang ma yin te de ni sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i dus nges pa la gdags pa'i phyir btags pa'i yod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: smras pa / gang gi yang ma yin te de ni sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i dus nges pa la gdags pa'i phyir btags pa'i yod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: He says: It is not a part of any. It is called a nominal existent because it is designated in dependence on a definite period of time projected by former karma.

original: du zhig dge ba dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig dge ba dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are virtuous?

original: smras pa / brgyad dam lnga'am drug gi phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / brgyad dam lnga'am drug gi phyogs so //
translated: He says: Eight, five, or a part of six.

original: du zhig mi dge ba dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig mi dge ba dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are nonvirtuous?

original: smras pa / drug gi phyogs gcig go //
analyzed: smras pa / drug gi phyogs gcig go //
translated: He says: One part of six.

original: du zhig lung du ma bstan pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig lung du ma bstan pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are indeterminate?

original: smras pa / brgyad dang lnga'i phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / brgyad dang lnga'i phyogs so //
translated: Eight and part of five.

original: du zhig rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin zhe na /
translated: How many have results?

original: smras pa / gcig dang bcu'i phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / gcig dang bcu'i phyogs so //
translated: One and part of ten.

original: du zhig rnam par smin pa med pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig rnam par smin pa med pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many do not have results?

original: smras pa / bcu gcig dang bcu'i phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / bcu gcig dang bcu'i phyogs so //
translated: Eleven and part of ten.

original: du zhig rnam par @91b smin pa dang bcas pa'i grogs dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig rnam par @91b smin pa dang bcas pa'i grogs dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are the companions of those that have results?

original: smras pa / tha ma gsum ste /
analyzed: smras pa / tha ma gsum ste /
translated: The last three.

original: lha dang mi'i rnam par smin pa shin tu gsal zhing nges pa'i don gyis rnam par smin pa 'dod pa'i grogs dag yin no //
analyzed: lha dang mi'i rnam par smin pa shin tu gsal zhing nges pa'i don gyis rnam par smin pa 'dod pa'i grogs dag yin no //
translated: They are the companions of those that have results that are the very clear and certain results of gods and humans.

original: du zhig rnam par smin pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig rnam par smin pa yin zhe na /
translated: How many have results?

original: smras pa / gcig dang dgu'i phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / gcig dang dgu'i phyogs so //
translated: One and part of nine.

original: du zhig gi sa bon dag rnam par smin pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig gi sa bon dag rnam par smin pa yin zhe na /
translated: How many have results that are seeds?

original: smras pa / thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: smras pa / thams cad kyi'o //
translated: All of them.

original: du zhig rnam par smin pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig rnam par smin pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: How many do not have results?

original: smras pa / bcu gnyis dang dgu'i phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / bcu gnyis dang dgu'i phyogs so //
translated: He says: Twelve and nine parts.

original: du zhig rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are born from the cause of karmic maturation?

original: smras pa / thams cad kho na ste sa bon gyis bsdus pa'i rnam par smin pa las grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: smras pa / thams cad kho na ste sa bon gyis bsdus pa'i rnam par smin pa las grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He says: All of them, because they are established from the cause of karmic maturation that is subsumed by seeds.

original: du zhig 'dod pa dang ldan pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig 'dod pa dang ldan pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many possess desire?

original: smras pa / bzhi dang bco lnga'i phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / bzhi dang bco lnga'i phyogs so //
translated: He says: Four and fifteen parts.

original: du zhig gzugs dang ldan pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig gzugs dang ldan pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many possess form?

original: smras pa / bco lnga'i phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / bco lnga'i phyogs so //
translated: He says: Fifteen parts.

original: du zhig gzugs med pa dang ldan bdag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig gzugs med pa dang ldan bdag yin zhe na /
translated: How many possess formlessness?

original: smras pa / dbang po brgyad kyi phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / dbang po brgyad kyi phyogs so //
translated: He says: Eight parts of faculties.

original: du zhig ldan pa ma yin pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: du zhig ldan pa ma yin pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: How many are not associated?

original: smras pa / gsum dang dgu'i phyogs so //
analyzed: smras pa / gsum dang dgu'i phyogs so //
translated: He says: Three and nine parts.

original: du zhig mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa la dmigs she na /
analyzed: du zhig mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa la dmigs she na /
translated: How many focus on the stage of unrestricted access concentration?

original: smras pa / bcu gcig go //
analyzed: smras pa / bcu gcig go //
translated: He says: Eleven.

original: gal te mi lcogs pa med pa ni yid bde ba'i dbang po yod na /
analyzed: gal te mi lcogs pa med pa ni yid bde ba'i dbang po yod na /
translated: If unrestricted access concentration possesses the faculty of mental satisfaction,

original: de lta na ci'i phyir bsam gtan dang po bzhin du dga' ba dang bcas par rnam par mi gzhag ce na /
analyzed: de lta na ci'i phyir bsam gtan dang po bzhin du dga' ba dang bcas par rnam par mi gzhag ce na /
translated: Why is it not posited as having joy, like the first absorption?

original: smras pa / de na dga' ba g-yo ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: smras pa / de na dga' ba g-yo ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said: because joy is unstable there.

original: de na de yod pa nyid du yid ches par 'gyur ba'i lung gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de na de yod pa nyid du yid ches par 'gyur ba'i lung gang yin zhe na /
translated: What scriptures prove that joy exists there?üîΩIt is said: the Bhagav√•n has said,

original: smras pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di na dge slong dben ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas lus de nyid mngon par rlan par byed /
analyzed: smras pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di na dge slong dben ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas lus de nyid mngon par rlan par byed /
translated: ‚ÄúHere a monk, through joy and pleasure born of seclusion,

original: yongs su rlan par byed /üîΩyongs su khyab par byed /
analyzed: yongs su rlan par byed / yongs su khyab par byed /
translated: soaks his body with it.

original: yongs su tshim par byed de /
analyzed: yongs su tshim par byed de /
translated: He fills it with it, suffuses it,üîΩand causes it to be entirely filled with the joy and pleasure born of seclusion.

original: de'i lus la 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i lus la 'di lta ste /
translated: There is no part of his body whatsoever

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas ma khyab pa dang khyab par bya ba chung zad kyang med do zhes ji skad du gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas ma khyab pa dang khyab par bya ba chung zad kyang med do zhes ji skad du gsungs pa ste /
translated: that is not suffused with the joy and pleasure born of seclusion.‚Äù

original: de la rnam grangs dang po dag gis ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i gnas skabs bstan to //
analyzed: de la rnam grangs dang po dag gis ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i gnas skabs bstan to //
translated: In this passage, the first two terms indicate the stage of unrestricted access concentration.

original: rnam grangs tha mas ni dngos gzhi'i gnas skabs bstan to //
analyzed: rnam grangs tha mas ni dngos gzhi'i gnas skabs bstan to //
translated: The last alternative indicates the stage of the actual meditative concentration.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i sa na dbang po du dag dmigs shen /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i sa na dbang po du dag dmigs shen /
translated: How many faculties are objects of observation of the first meditative concentration?

original: smras pa / bco brgyad do //
analyzed: smras pa / bco brgyad do //
translated: He says: eighteen.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa na yang de dag nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa na yang de dag nyid do //
translated: How many faculties are objects of observation of the second meditative concentration?üîΩHe says: those same eighteen.

original: @92a * // bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa na dbang po du dag dmigs she na /
analyzed: @92a * // bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa na dbang po du dag dmigs she na /
translated: How many faculties are objects of observation of the third meditative concentration?

original: smras pa / bcu bdun no //
analyzed: smras pa / bcu bdun no //
translated: He says: seventeen.üîΩHow many faculties are objects of observation of the fourth meditative concentration?

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa na ni bcu drug go //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa na ni bcu drug go //
translated: He says: sixteen.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa na dbang po du dag dmigs she na /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa na dbang po du dag dmigs she na /
translated: How many faculties are objects of observation of the sphere of infinite space?

original: smras pa / bcu gcig go //
analyzed: smras pa / bcu gcig go //
translated: He says: eleven.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa na ji lta ba bzhin du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa na yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa na ji lta ba bzhin du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa na yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the sphere of infinite space, so the sphere of infinite consciousness and the sphere of nothingness should be regarded as having eleven faculties as their objects of observation.

original: 'du shes mad 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sa na dbang po du dag dmigs she na /
analyzed: 'du shes mad 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sa na dbang po du dag dmigs she na /
translated: How many faculties are objects of observation of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception?

original: smras pa / brgyad do //
analyzed: smras pa / brgyad do //
translated: He says: eight.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i sas bsdus pa'i dbang po rnams zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i sas bsdus pa'i dbang po rnams zag pa dang bcas pa'am /
translated: The faculties subsumed by the first absorption level are either contaminated or uncontaminated.üîΩ

original: zag pa med par brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: zag pa med par brjod par bya zhe na /
translated: Should the faculties included in the first absorption stage be called contaminated or uncontaminated?

original: smras pa / rnam pa gnyi gar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: smras pa / rnam pa gnyi gar brjod par bya'o //
translated: It is said: They should be called both.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i sas bsdus pa dag ji lta ba bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa'i bar gyis bsdus pa dag kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i sas bsdus pa dag ji lta ba bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa'i bar gyis bsdus pa dag kyang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as those included in the first absorption stage, so too are those included in the stages up to the base of nothingness.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sas bsdus pa'i dbang po rnams ni rigs las ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag tu brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sas bsdus pa'i dbang po rnams ni rigs las ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag tu brjod par bya'o //
translated: The faculties included in the base of neither discernment nor nondiscernment should be called contaminated from the perspective of type.

original: rgyud las ni rnam pa gnyi gar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyud las ni rnam pa gnyi gar brjod par bya'o //
translated: From the perspective of the mindstream, they should be called both.

original: zag pa med pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa las rnam par grol ba las rig par bya'o ;
analyzed: zag pa med pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa las rnam par grol ba las rig par bya'o ;
translated: Those uncontaminated faculties should be known as liberated from affliction.

original: / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dag ji lta ba bzhin du spang bar bya ba dang spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag kyang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dag ji lta ba bzhin du spang bar bya ba dang spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag kyang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: As with the contaminated and uncontaminated, so should the view be taken with regard to what is to be abandoned and what is not to be abandoned, and with regard to what is mundane and what is supramundane.

original: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes shing byung ba dbang po du dag dang ldan par brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams su skyes shing byung ba dbang po du dag dang ldan par brjod par bya zhe na /
translated: How many faculties are possessed by one who is born and exists in the desire realm?

original: smras pa ; srid pa'i dbang du byas nas thams cad dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa ; srid pa'i dbang du byas nas thams cad dang ngo //
translated: It is said: all, in terms of existence.

original: sems can dmyal bar skyes pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: sems can dmyal bar skyes pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many are possessed by one born in the hells?

original: smras pa / brgyad dang ni kun du 'byung ba dang sa bon las ldan pa yin no //üîΩlhag ma rnams las gsum ma gtogs pa dag dang ni ldan pa'ang yod /
analyzed: smras pa / brgyad dang ni kun du 'byung ba dang sa bon las ldan pa yin no // lhag ma rnams las gsum ma gtogs pa dag dang ni ldan pa'ang yod /
translated: It is said: eight, in terms of the arising and seeds.

original: mi ldan pa'ang yod do ;
analyzed: mi ldan pa'ang yod do ;
translated: One may or may not possess the remaining faculties, except for three.üîΩHow many are possessed by one born in the realm of Yama?

original: gsum dang ni kun du 'byung ba las ni mi ldan pa yin la sa bon las ni gal te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin na ni ldan no //
analyzed: gsum dang ni kun du 'byung ba las ni mi ldan pa yin la sa bon las ni gal te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin na ni ldan no //
translated: One is not endowed with the seeds of the three unwholesome actions of body and speech, but one is endowed with the seeds of the wholesome actions of body and speech, and one is endowed with the seeds of the three unwholesome actions of mind.

original: gal te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma yin na ni mi ldan no //üîΩgzhan gsum dang ni kun du 'byung ba las ni mi ldan no //
analyzed: gal te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma yin na ni mi ldan no // gzhan gsum dang ni kun du 'byung ba las ni mi ldan no //
translated: One is not endowed with the seeds of the wholesome actions of mind, but one is endowed with the seeds of the wholesome actions of body and speech.üîΩOne is not endowed with the seeds of the three unwholesome actions of body and speech, but one is endowed with the seeds of the wholesome actions of body and speech.

original: @92b sa bon las ni ldan no //
analyzed: @92b sa bon las ni ldan no //
translated: One is not endowed with the seeds of the three unwholesome actions of mind, but one is endowed with the seeds of the wholesome actions of mind.

original: sems can dmyal bar skyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du gcig tu sdug bsngal ba'i dud 'gro rnams dang yi dvags rnams la yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can dmyal bar skyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du gcig tu sdug bsngal ba'i dud 'gro rnams dang yi dvags rnams la yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: Just as in the hells, so in the animal kingdom and the world of Yama.

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal 'dren mar nyams su myong ba rnams la ni tha ma gsum dang kun du 'byung ba las ldan par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal 'dren mar nyams su myong ba rnams la ni tha ma gsum dang kun du 'byung ba las ldan par blta bar bya'o //
translated: In the realm of the gods and humans, one is endowed with the three wholesome actions of body and speech and the three unwholesome actions of body and speech.

original: mir skyes ba dbang po du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: mir skyes ba dbang po du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many faculties does a human being possess?

original: smras pa / srid pa las ni thams cad dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / srid pa las ni thams cad dang ngo //
translated: All, except for the sexual faculties and the two pain faculties.

original: mir skyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du lhar skyes pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: mir skyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du lhar skyes pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as with those born as humans, so it is for those born as gods.

original: dbang po ma tshang ba dbang po du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po ma tshang ba dbang po du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many faculties does one possess who is born with incomplete faculties?

original: smras pa / lnga ma gtogs par srid pa las de las gzhan pa dag dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / lnga ma gtogs par srid pa las de las gzhan pa dag dang ngo //
translated: It is said: Except for five, one possesses the rest of those from the realm of existence.

original: dbang po tshang ba ni srid pa las thams cad dang ngo //
analyzed: dbang po tshang ba ni srid pa las thams cad dang ngo //
translated: One who is born with complete faculties possesses all of those from the realm of existence.

original: za ma du dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: za ma du dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many does a eunuch possess?

original: smras pa / lnga ma gtogs par srid pa las de las gzhan pa thams cad dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / lnga ma gtogs par srid pa las de las gzhan pa thams cad dang ngo //
translated: It is said: Except for five, one possesses the rest of those from the realm of existence.

original: bud med du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: bud med du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many does a woman possess?

original: smras pa / srid pa las nyi shu rtsa gcig dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / srid pa las nyi shu rtsa gcig dang ngo //
translated: It is said: One possesses twenty-one from the realm of existence.

original: skyes pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: skyes pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many does a man possess?

original: smras pa / srid pa las nyi shu rtsa gcig kho na dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / srid pa las nyi shu rtsa gcig kho na dang ngo //
translated: It is said: One possesses twenty-one from the realm of existence.

original: mtshan gnyis pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: mtshan gnyis pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many does one with two organs possess?

original: smras pa / srid pa las bcu dgu dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / srid pa las bcu dgu dang ngo //
translated: It is said: One possesses nineteen from the realm of existence.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many does one whose roots of virtue are severed possess?

original: smras pa / brgyad ma gtogs par srid pa de las gzhan pa dag dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / brgyad ma gtogs par srid pa de las gzhan pa dag dang ngo //
translated: It is said: Except for the eight, they possess the others.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma chad pa du dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma chad pa du dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many roots of virtue are possessed?

original: smras pa / srid pa las thams cad dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / srid pa las thams cad dang ngo //
translated: It is said: They possess all the roots of virtue.

original: so so'i skye bo du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many are ordinary beings?

original: smras pa / gsum ma gtogs par srid pa las bcu dgu dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / gsum ma gtogs par srid pa las bcu dgu dang ngo //
translated: It is said: Except for the three, they possess nineteen existences.

original: bden pa mthong ba du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many have seen the truths?

original: smras pa / srid pa las thams cad dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / srid pa las thams cad dang ngo //
translated: It is said: They possess all existences.

original: slob pa du dag dang ldan zhe na ;
analyzed: slob pa du dag dang ldan zhe na ;
translated: How many are learners?

original: smras pa / srid pa las nyi shu rtsa gcig dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / srid pa las nyi shu rtsa gcig dang ngo //
translated: It is said: They possess twenty-one existences.

original: mi slob pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: mi slob pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many are nonlearners?

original: smras pa / srid pa las bcu dgu dang ngo /
analyzed: smras pa / srid pa las bcu dgu dang ngo /
translated: It is said: They possess nineteen existences.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir zhugs pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir zhugs pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many are engaged for the sake of the fruit of stream entry?

original: smras pa / srid pa las nyi shu dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / srid pa las nyi shu dang ngo //
translated: It is said: They possess twenty existences.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many are stream enterers?

original: smras pa / srid pa las nyi shu kho na dang ngo //
analyzed: smras pa / srid pa las nyi shu kho na dang ngo //
translated: It is said: Twenty from existence.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa ji lta ba bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir zhugs pa dang yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa ji lta ba bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir zhugs pa dang yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the stream-enterer, so the once-returner and non-returner, and the one who has entered the result of non-returner should be seen in the same way.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba du dag dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba du dag dang ldan zhe na /
translated: How many are the non-returners?

original: smras pa / srid pa las bcu dgu dang ngo //üîΩphyir mi 'ong ba ji lta ba bzhin du dgra @93a * //
analyzed: smras pa / srid pa las bcu dgu dang ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba ji lta ba bzhin du dgra @93a * //
translated: It is said: Nineteen from existence.

original: bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i phyir zhugs pa'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i phyir zhugs pa'ang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as the non-returner, so the one who has entered the result of arhatship should be seen in the same way.
